h4.p: [21] yo ^a^P4.0900^ea^ ^a^M0.0173^ea^ ^a^V0.0162^ea^ bhikkhuuna.m vibha"ngassa, sa"ngahito anantara.m.
[22] bhikkhuniina.m vibha"ngassa, tassa sa.mva.n.nanaakkamo..
[21] patto yato tato tassa, apubbapadava.n.nana.m.
[22] kaatu.m paaraajike taava, hoti sa.mva.n.nanaa aya.m..

[03] 656^b^.^eb^ ^b^tena samayena buddho bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati...pe0... saa.lho migaaranattaa^eb^ti ettha ^b^saa.lho^eb^ti tassa naama.m; migaaramaatuyaa pana nattaa hoti, tena vutta.m -- ``migaaranattaa''ti. ^b^navakammika^eb^nti navakammaadhi.t.thaayika.m. ^b^pa.n.ditaa^eb^ti pa.n.diccena samannaagataa. ^b^byattaa^eb^ti veyyattikena samannaagataa. ^b^medhaavinii^eb^ti paa.liggaha.ne satipubba"ngamaaya pa~n~naaya atthaggaha.ne pa~n~naapubba"ngamaaya satiyaa samannaagataa. ^b^dakkhaa^eb^ti chekaa; avirajjhitvaa siigha.m kattabbakaariniiti attho. ^b^analasaa^eb^ti aalasiyavirahitaa. ^b^tatrupaayaayaa^eb^ti tesu tesu kammesu upaayabhuutaaya. ^b^viima.msaayaa^eb^ti kattabbakammupaparikkhaaya ^a^V0.0163^ea^. ^b^samannaagataa^eb^ti sampayuttaa. ^b^ala.m kaatu^eb^nti samatthaa ta.m ta.m kamma.m kaatu.m. ^b^ala.m sa.mvidhaatu^eb^nti eva~nca eva~nca ida.m hotuuti eva.m sa.mvidahitumpi samatthaa. ^b^kataakata.m jaanitu^eb^nti kata~nca akata~nca jaanitu.m. ^b^te^eb^ti te ubho; saa ca sundariinandaa so ca saa.lhoti attho. ^b^bhattagge^eb^ti parivesana.t.thaane. ^b^nikuu.te^eb^ti ko.nasadisa.m katvaa dassite ^a^P4.0901^ea^ gambhiire. ^b^vissaro me bhavissatii^eb^ti viruupo me saro ^a^M0.0174^ea^ bhavissati; vippakaarasaddo bhavissatiiti attho. ^b^patimaanentii^eb^ti apekkhamaanaa. ^b^kyaaha^eb^nti ki.m aha.m. ^b^jaraadubbalaa^eb^ti jaraaya dubbalaa. ^b^cara.nagilaanaa^eb^ti paadarogena samannaagataa.

[03] 657-8^b^.^eb^ ^b^avassutaa^eb^ti kaayasa.msaggaraagena avassutaa; tintaa kilinnaati attho. padabhaajane panassa tameva raaga.m gahetvaa ``saarattaa''tiaadi vutta.m. tattha ^b^saarattaa^eb^ti vattha.m viya ra"ngajaatena kaayasa.msaggaraagena su.t.thu rattaa. ^b^apekkhavatii^eb^ti tasseva raagassa vasena tasmi.m purise pavattaaya apekkhaaya samannaagataa. ^b^pa.tibaddhacittaa^eb^ti tena raagena tasmi.m purise bandhitvaa .thapitacittaa viya. esa nayo dutiyapadavibha"ngepi. ^b^purisapuggalassaa^eb^ti purisasa"nkhaatassa puggalassa. ^b^adhakkhaka^eb^nti akkhakaana.m adho. ^b^ubbhajaa.numa.n.dala^eb^nti jaa.numa.n.dalaana.m upari. padabhaajane pana padapa.tipaa.tiyaa eva ``he.t.thakkhaka.m uparijaa.numa.n.dala''nti vutta.m. ettha ca ubbhakapparampi ubbhajaa.numa.n.daleneva sa"ngahita.m. sesa.m mahaavibha"nge vuttanayeneva veditabba.m. ^b^purimaayo upaadaayaa^eb^ti saadhaara.napaaraajikehi paaraajikaayo catasso upaadaayaati attho. ^b^ubbhajaa.numa.n.dalikaa^eb^ti ida.m pana imissaa paaraajikaaya naamamatta.m, tasmaa padabhaajane na vicaarita.m.

[03] 659^b^.^eb^ eva.m uddi.t.thasikkhaapada.m padaanukkamena vibhajitvaa idaani avassutaadibhedena aapattibheda.m dassetu.m ^b^``ubhatoavassute''^eb^tiaadimaaha. ^b^tattha ubhatoavassute^eb^ti ubhatoavassave; bhikkhuniyaa ceva purisassa ca kaayasa.msaggaraagena avassutabhaave satiiti attho. ^b^kaayena kaaya.m aamasatii^eb^ti bhikkhunii yathaaparicchinnena kaayena purisassa ya.mki~nci kaaya.m puriso vaa yena kenaci kaayena bhikkhuniyaa yathaaparicchinna.m kaaya.m aamasati, ubhayathaapi bhikkhuniyaa paaraajika.m. ^b^kaayena kaayapa.tibaddha^eb^nti vuttappakaareneva attano kaayena purisassa kaayapa.tibaddha.m. ^b^aamasatii^eb^ti ettha saya.m vaa aamasatu, tassa vaa aamasana.m saadiyatu, thullaccayameva. ^b^kaayapa.tibaddhena kaaya^eb^nti attano vuttappakaarakaayapa.tibaddhena purisassa kaaya.m. ^b^aamasatii^eb^ti idhaapi saya.m vaa aamasatu, tassa vaa aamasana.m saadiyatu, thullaccayameva. avasesapadesupi iminaava ^a^P4.0902^ea^ nayena vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03]sace ^a^M0.0175^ea^ ^a^V0.0164^ea^ pana bhikkhu ceva bhikkhunii ca hoti, tatra ce bhikkhunii aamasati, bhikkhu niccalo hutvaa cittena saadiyati, bhikkhu aapattiyaa na kaaretabbo. sace bhikkhu aamasati, bhikkhunii niccalaa hutvaa citteneva adhivaaseti, kaaya"nga.m acopayamaanaapi paaraajikakkhette paaraajikena, thullaccayakkhette thullaccayena, dukka.takkhette dukka.tena kaaretabbaa. kasmaa? ``kaayasa.msagga.m saadiyeyyaa''ti vuttattaa. aya.m a.t.thakathaasu vinicchayo. eva.m pana sati kiriyaasamu.t.thaanataa na dissati, tasmaa tabbahulanayena saa vuttaati veditabbaa.
[03] 660^b^.^eb^ ^b^ubbhakkhaka^eb^nti akkhakaana.m upari. ^b^adhojaa.numa.n.dala^eb^nti jaa.numa.n.dalaana.m he.t.thaa. ettha ca adhokapparampi adhojaa.numa.n.daleneva sa"ngahita.m.
[03] 662^b^.^eb^ ^b^ekatoavassute^eb^ti ettha ki~ncaapi ekatoti avisesena vutta.m, tathaapi bhikkhuniyaa eva avassute sati aya.m aapattibhedo vuttoti veditabbo.

[03]tatraaya.m aadito pa.t.thaaya vinicchayo -- bhikkhunii kaayasa.msaggaraagena avassutaa, purisopi tatheva. adhakkhake ubbhajaa.numa.n.dale kaayappadese kaayasa.msaggasaadiyane sati bhikkhuniyaa paaraajika.m. bhikkhuniyaa kaayasa.msaggaraago, purisassa methunaraago vaa gehassitapema.m vaa suddhacitta.m vaa hotu, thullaccayameva. bhikkhuniyaa methunaraago, purisassa kaayasa.msaggaraago vaa methunaraago vaa gahessitapema.m vaa suddhacitta.m vaa hotu, dukka.ta.m. bhikkhuniyaa gehassitapema.m, purisassa vuttesu catuusu ya.m vaa ta.m vaa hotu, dukka.tameva. bhikkhuniyaa suddhacitta.m, purisassa vuttesu catuusu ya.m vaa ta.m vaa hotu, anaapatti.

[03]sace pana bhikkhu ceva hoti bhikkhunii ca ubhinna.m kaayasa.msaggaraago, bhikkhussa sa"nghaadiseso, bhikkhuniyaa paaraajika.m. bhikkhuniyaa kaayasa.msaggaraago, bhikkhussa methunaraago vaa gehassitapema.m vaa, bhikkhuniyaa thullaccaya.m, bhikkhussa dukka.ta.m. ubhinna.m methunaraago vaa gehassitapema.m vaa, ubhinnampi dukka.tameva. yassa yattha suddhacitta.m, tassa tattha anaapatti. ubhinnampi suddhacitta.m, ubhinnampi anaapatti.

[03] 663^b^.^eb^ ^b^anaapatti^eb^ ^a^M0.0176^ea^ ^b^asa~nciccaa^eb^tiaadiisu virajjhitvaa vaa aamasantiyaa a~n~navihitaaya vaa ``aya.m puriso vaa itthii vaa''ti ajaanantiyaa vaa tena phu.t.thaayapi ta.m phassa.m asaadiyantiyaa vaa aamasanepi sati anaapatti. sesa.m sabbattha uttaanameva ^a^P4.0903^ea^.
[03]pa.thamapaaraajikasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^V0.0165^ea^ -- kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dvivedananti.
[06] pa.thamapaaraajika.m.
[03] 664^b^.^eb^ dutiye paaraajike -- ^b^kacci no saa^eb^ti kacci nu saa. ^b^ava.n.no^eb^ti agu.no. ^b^akittii^eb^ti nindaa. ^b^ayaso^eb^ti parivaaravipatti; parammukhagarahaa vaa.
[03] 665^b^.^eb^ ^b^vajjapa.ticchaadikaa^eb^ti idampi imissaa paaraajikaaya naamamattameva, tasmaa padabhaajane na vicaarita.m. sesamettha uttaanameva.

[03] 666^b^.^eb^ ^b^saa vaa aarocetii^eb^ti yaa paaraajika.m aapannaa, saa saya.m aaroceti. ^b^a.t.thanna.m paaraajikaana.m a~n~natara^eb^nti bhikkhuuhi saadhaara.naana.m catunna.m asaadhaara.naana~nca catunnameva a~n~natara.m. ida~nca paaraajika.m pacchaa pa~n~natta.m, tasmaa ``a.t.thanna''nti vibha"nge vutta.m. purimena pana saddhi.m yuga.lattaa imasmi.m okaase .thapitanti veditabba.m. ^b^dhura.m nikkhittamatte^eb^ti dhure nikkhittamatte. vitthaarakathaa panettha sappaa.nakavaggamhi du.t.thullasikkhaapade vuttanayeneva veditabbaa. tatra hi paacittiya.m, idha paaraajikanti ayameva viseso. sesa.m taadisameva. ^b^vajjapa.ticchaadikaa^eb^ti idampiimissaa paaraajikaaya naamamatthaameva, tasmaa padabhaajane na vicaarita.m. sesamettha uttaanameva.
[01] dhuranikkhepasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayavaacaacittato samu.t.thaati, akiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] dutiyapaaraajika.m.

[03] 669^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M0.0177^ea^^b^ -- dhammenaa^eb^ti bhuutena vatthunaa. ^b^vinayenaa^eb^ti codetvaa saaretvaa. padabhaajana.m panassa ``yena dhammena yena vinayena ukkhitto suukkhitto hotii''ti ima.m^bb^adhippaayamatta.m dassetu.m vutta.m. ^b^satthusaasanenaa^eb^ti ~nattisampadaaya ceva anusaavanasampadaaya ca. padabhaajane ^a^V0.0166^ea^ panassa ``jinasaasanena buddhasaasanenaa''ti vevacanamattameva vutta.m.^b^ sa"ngha.m vaa ga.na.m vaa^eb^tiaadiisu yena sa"nghena kamma.m kata.m, ta.m sa"ngha.m vaa tattha sambahulapuggalasa"nkhaata.m ^a^P4.0904^ea^ ga.na.m vaa, ekapuggala.m vaa ta.m kamma.m vaa na aadiyati, na anuvattati, na tattha aadara.m janetiiti attho. ^b^samaanasa.mvaasakaa bhikkhuu vuccanti sahaayaa, so tehi saddhi.m natthii^eb^ti ettha ``ekakamma.m ekuddeso samasikkhataa''ti aya.m taava sa.mvaaso; samaano sa.mvaaso etesanti ^b^samaanasa.mvaasakaa.^eb^evaruupaa bhikkhuu bhikkhussa tasmi.m sa.mvaase saha ayanabhaavena^b^ sahaayaa^eb^ti vuccanti. idaani yena sa.mvaasena te samaanasa.mvaasakaati vuttaa, so sa.mvaaso tassa ukkhittakassa tehi saddhi.m natthi. yehi ca saddhi.m tassa so sa.mvaaso natthi, na tena te bhikkhuu attano sahaayaa kataa honti. tasmaa vutta.m ``samaanasa.mvaasakaa bhikkhuu vuccanti sahaayaa, so tehi saddhi.m natthi, tena vuccati akatasahaayo''ti. sesa.m sa"nghabhedasikkhaapadaadiisu vuttanayattaa uttaanatthameva.
[03]samanubhaasanasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayavaacaacittato samu.t.thaati, akiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dukkhavedananti.
[06] tatiyapaaraajika.m.

[03] 675^b^.^eb^ catutthe -- ^b^avassutaa^eb^ti lokassaadamittasanthavavasena kaayasa.msaggaraagena avassutaa. dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. ^b^purisapuggalassa hatthaggaha.na.m vaa^eb^tiaadiisu pana ya.m purisapuggalena hatthe gaha.na.m kata.m, ta.m purisapuggalassa hatthaggaha.nanti vutta.m. eseva nayo ^b^sa"nghaa.tika.n.naggaha.nepi. hatthaggaha.na^eb^nti ettha ca hatthaggaha.na~nca a~n~nampi apaaraajikakkhette gaha.na~nca ^a^M0.0178^ea^ ekajjha.m katvaa hatthaggaha.nanti vuttanti veditabba.m. tenevassa padabhaajane ``hatthaggaha.na.m vaa saadiyeyyaati hattho naama kappara.m upaadaaya yaava agganakhaa, etassa asaddhammassa pa.tisevanatthaaya ubbhakkhaka.m adhojaa.numa.n.dala.m gaha.na.m saadiyati, aapatti thullaccayassaa''ti vutta.m. ettha ca ^b^asaddhammo^eb^ti kaayasa.msaggo veditabbo, na methunadhammo. na hi methunassa saamantaa ^a^P4.0905^ea^ thullaccaya.m hoti. ``vi~n~nuu pa.tibalo kaayasa.msagga.m samaapajjitunti vacanampi cettha saadhaka.m.
[21] ``tissitthiyo methuna.m ta.m na seve,
[27] tayo purise tayo ca anariyapa.n.dake.
[26] na ^a^V0.0167^ea^ caacare methuna.m bya~njanasmi.m,
[27] chejjaa siyaa methunadhammapaccayaa.
[22] pa~nhaa mesaa kusalehi cintitaa''ti.. (pari0 481).

[03]imaaya parivaare vuttaaya sedamocakagaathaaya virujjhatiiti ce? na; methunadhammassa pubbabhaagattaa. parivaareyeva hi ``methunadhammassa pubbabhaago jaanitabbo''ti ``va.n.naava.n.no kaayasa.msaggo du.t.thullavaacaa attakaamapaaricariyaagamanuppaadana''nti eva.m sukkavissa.t.thiaadiini pa~nca sikkhaapadaani methunadhammassa pubbabhaagoti vuttaani. tasmaa kaayasa.msaggo methunadhammassa pubbabhaagattaa paccayo hoti. iti ^b^chejjaa siyaa methunadhammapaccayaa^eb^ti ettha iminaa pariyaayena attho veditabbo. etenupaayena sabbapadesu vinicchayo veditabbo. apica ``sa"nketa.m vaa gaccheyyaa''ti etassa padabhaajane ^b^``itthannaama.m aagacchaa''^eb^ti. eva.mnaamaka.m .thaana.m aagacchaati attho.

[03] 676^b^.^eb^ ^b^a.t.thama.m vatthu.m paripuurentii assama.nii hotii^eb^ti anulomato vaa pa.tilomato vaa ekantarikaaya vaa yena tena nayena a.t.thama.m vatthu.m paripuurentiiyeva assama.nii hoti. yaa pana eka.m vaa vatthu.m satta vaa vatthuuni satakkhattumpi puureti, neva assama.nii hoti. aapannaa aapattiyo desetvaa muccati. apicettha ga.nanuupikaa aapatti veditabbaa. vutta~nheta.m ``atthaapatti desitaa ga.nanuupikaa, atthaapatti desitaa na ga.nanuupikaa''ti. tatraaya.m vinicchayo -- idaani naapajjissaamiiti dhuranikkhepa.m katvaa desitaa ga.nanuupikaa desitaga.nana.m upeti paaraajikassa a"nga.m na ^a^M0.0179^ea^ hoti. tasmaa yaa eka.m aapannaa dhuranikkhepa.m katvaa desetvaa puna kilesavasena aapajjati, puna deseti, eva.m a.t.tha vatthuuni puurentiipi paaraajikaa na hoti. yaa pana aapajjitvaa punapi a~n~na.m vatthu.m aapajjissaamiiti ^a^P4.0906^ea^ saussaahaava deseti, tassaa saa aapatti naga.nanuupikaa, desitaapi adesitaa hoti, desitaga.nana.m na gacchati, paaraajikasseva a"nga.m hoti. a.t.thame vatthumhi paripu.n.namatte paaraajikaa hoti. sesa.m uttaanamevaati.
[01] dhuranikkhepasamu.t.thaana.m -- kaayavaacaacittato samu.t.thaati, kiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, lokavajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, akusalacitta.m, dvivedananti.
[06] catutthapaaraajika.m.

[03]^b^uddi.t.thaa^eb^ ^a^V0.0168^ea^ ^b^kho ayyaayo a.t.tha paaraajikaa dhammaa^eb^ti bhikkhuu aarabbha pa~n~nattaa saadhaara.naa cattaaro ime ca cattaaroti eva.m paatimokkhuddesamaggena uddi.t.thaa kho ayyaayo a.t.tha paaraajikaa dhammaati evamettha attho da.t.thabbo. sesa.m mahaavibha"nge vuttanayamevaati.
[06] samantapaasaadikaaya vinayasa.mva.n.nanaaya bhikkhuniivibha"nge
[06] paaraajikaka.n.dava.n.nanaa ni.t.thitaa.
[06] paaraajikaka.n.da.m ni.t.thita.m.
[21] paaraajikaanantarassa ^a^M0.0180^ea^ ^a^V0.0169^ea^, aya.m daani bhavissati.
[22] sa"nghaadisesaka.n.dassa, anuttaanatthava.n.nanaa..

[03] 678^b^.^eb^ ^b^udosita^eb^nti bha.n.dasaalaa. ^b^maayyo eva.m avacaa^eb^ti ayyo maa eva.m avaca. ^b^apinaayyaa^eb^ti apinu ayyaa. ^b^accaavadathaa^eb^ti atikkamitvaa vadatha; akkosathaati vutta.m hoti.

[03] 679^b^.^eb^ ^b^ussayavaadikaa^eb^ti maanussayavasena kodhussayavasena vivadamaanaa. yasmaa pana saa atthato a.t.takaarikaa hoti, tasmaa ``ussayavaadikaa naama a.d.dakaarikaa vuccatii''ti padabhaajane vutta.m. ettha ca ^b^a.d.do^eb^ti vohaarikavinicchayo vuccati, ya.m pabbajitaa ``adhikara.na''ntipi vadanti. ^b^dutiya.m vaa pariyesatii^eb^ti sakkhi.m ^a^P4.0907^ea^ vaa sahaaya.m vaa pariyesati, dukka.ta.m. ^b^gacchati vaa^eb^ti upassayo vaa hotu bhikkhaacaaramaggo vaa, yattha .thitaaya ``a.d.da.m karissaamii''ti citta.m uppajjati, tato vohaarikaana.m santika.m gacchantiyaa padavaare padavaare dukka.ta.m. ^b^ekassa aarocetii^eb^ti dviisu janesu yassa kassaci ekassa katha.m yo koci vohaarikaana.m aaroceti. ^b^dutiyassa aarocetii^eb^ti etthaapi eseva nayo.

[03]aya.m panettha asammohatthaaya vitthaarakathaa -- yattha katthaci antamaso bhikkhunupassaya.m aagatepi vohaarike disvaa bhikkhunii attano katha.m aaroceti, bhikkhuniyaa dukka.ta.m. upaasako attano katha.m aaroceti, bhikkhuniyaa thullaccaya.m. pa.thama.m upaasako attano katha.m aaroceti ^a^V0.0170^ea^, bhikkhuniyaa dukka.ta.m. atha saa attano katha.m aaroceti, thullaccaya.m. bhikkhunii upaasaka.m vadati -- ``mama ca tava ca katha.m tva.myeva aarocehii''ti, so attano vaa katha.m pa.thama.m aarocetu bhikkhuniyaa vaa, pa.thamaarocane dukka.ta.m, dutiyaarocane thullaccaya.m. upaasako bhikkhuni.m vadati -- ``mama ca tava ca katha.m tva.myeva aarocehii''ti, etthaapi eseva nayo.

[03]bhikkhunii ^a^M0.0181^ea^ kappiyakaarakena kathaapeti, tattha kappiyakaarako vaa bhikkhuniyaa katha.m pa.thama.m aarocetu, itaro vaa attano katha.m, kappiyakaarako vaa ubhinnampi katha.m, itaro vaa ubhinnampi katha.m aarocetu, yathaa vaa tathaa vaa aarociyamaane pa.thame aarocane bhikkhuniyaa dukka.ta.m, dutiye thullaccaya.m. yathaa vaa tathaa vaa aarocita.m pana ubhinnampi katha.m sutvaa vohaarikehi vinicchaye kate a.d.dapariyosaana.m naama hoti, tasmi.m a.d.dapariyosaane bhikkhuniyaa jayepi paraajayepi sa"nghaadiseso. sace pana gatigata.m adhikara.na.m hoti, sutapubba.m vohaarikehi. atha te bhikkhuni~nca a.d.dakaaraka~nca disvaava ``tumhaaka.m kathanakicca.m natthi, jaanaama maya.m ettha pavatti''nti sayameva vinicchinitvaa denti, evaruupe a.d.dapariyosaanepi bhikkhuniyaa anaapatti.

[03]pa.thama.m aapatti etassaati pa.thamaapattiko; viitikkamakkha.neyeva aapajjitabboti attho, ta.m ^b^pa.thamaapattika.m^eb^. padabhaajane pana adhippaayamatta.m dassetu.m ``saha vatthujjhaacaaraa ^a^P4.0908^ea^ aapajjati asamanubhaasanaayaa''ti vutta.m. aya~nhettha attho -- saha vatthujjhaacaaraa ya.m bhikkhunii aapajjati, na tatiyaaya samanubhaasanaaya, aya.m pa.thamameva saha vatthujjhaacaarena aapajjitabbattaa pa.thamaapattikoti. bhikkhunisa"nghato nissaaretiiti nissaara.niiyo; ta.m ^b^nissaara.niiya.m^eb^. padabhaajane pana adhippaayamatta.m dassetu.m ``sa"nghamhaa nissaariiyatiiti vutta.m. tattha ya.m aapannaa bhikkhunii sa"nghato nissaariiyati, so nissaara.niiyoti evamattho da.t.thabbo. na hi so eva dhammo sa"nghamhaa kenaci nissaariiyati. tena pana dhammena bhikkhunii nissaariiyati, tasmaa so nissaaretiiti nissaara.niiyo.

[03]^b^aaka.d.dhiyamaanaa gacchatii^eb^ti a.d.dakaarakamanussehi saya.m vaa aagantvaa duuta.m vaa pesetvaa ehiiti vuccamaanaa vohaarikaana.m santika.m gacchati, tato a.d.dakaarako attano vaa katha.m pa.thama.m aarocetu bhikkhuniyaa vaa, neva pa.thamaarocane dukka.ta.m, na dutiyaarocane thullaccaya.m. amaccehi vinicchinitvaa kate a.d.dapariyosaanepi anaapattiyeva. sacepi a.d.dakaarako bhikkhuni.m ^a^V0.0171^ea^ vadati ``mama ca tava ca katha.m tvameva kathehii''ti; kathentiyaapi katha.m sutvaa kate a.d.dapariyosaanepi anaapattiyeva.

[03]^b^rakkha.m^eb^ ^a^M0.0182^ea^ ^b^yaacatii^eb^ti dhammika.m rakkha.m yaacati, anaapatti. idaani yathaayaacitaa rakkhaa dhammikaa hoti, ta.m dassetu.m ^b^anodissa aacikkhatii^eb^ti aaha. tattha atiita.m aarabbha atthi odissaaacikkhanaa, atthi anodissaaacikkhanaa, anaagata.m aarabbhaapi atthi odissaaacikkhanaa, atthi anodissaaacikkhanaa.

[03]katha.m atiita.m aarabbha odissaaacikkhanaa hoti? bhikkhunupassaye gaamadaarakaa dhuttaadayo vaa ye keci anaacaara.m vaa aacaranti, rukkha.m vaa chindanti, phalaaphala.m vaa haranti, parikkhaare vaa acchindanti. bhikkhunii vohaarike upasa"nkamitvaa ``amhaaka.m upassaye ida.m naama kata''nti vadati. ``kenaa''ti vutte ^a^P4.0909^ea^ ``asukena ca asukena caa''ti aacikkhati. eva.m atiita.m aarabbha odissaaacikkhanaa hoti, saa na va.t.tati. ta~nce sutvaa te vohaarikaa tesa.m da.n.da.m karonti, sabba.m bhikkhuniyaa giivaa hoti. da.n.da.m ga.nhissantiiti adhippaayepi sati giivaayeva hoti. sace pana tassa da.n.da.m ga.nhathaati vadati, pa~ncamaasakamatte gahite paaraajika.m hoti.

[03]``kenaa''ti vutte pana ``asukenaati vattu.m amhaaka.m na va.t.tati, tumheyeva jaanissatha. kevala~nhi maya.m rakkha.m yaacaama, ta.m no detha, avaha.tabha.n.da~nca aaharaapethaa''ti vattabba.m. eva.m anodissa aacikkhanaa hoti, saa va.t.tati. eva.m vutte sacepi te vohaarikaa kaarake gavesitvaa tesa.m da.n.da.m karonti, sabba.m saapateyyampi gahita.m bhikkhuniyaa, neva giivaa na aapatti.

[03]parikkhaara.m harante disvaa tesa.m anatthakaamataaya coro coroti vattumpi na va.t.tati. eva.m vuttepi hi ya.m tesa.m da.n.da.m karonti, sabbampi bhikkhuniyaa giivaa hoti. attano vacanakara.m pana ``iminaa me parikkhaaro gahito, ta.m aaharaapehi, maa cassa da.n.da.m karohii''ti vattu.m va.t.tati. daasadaasiivaapiaadiina.m atthaaya a.d.da.m karonti, aya.m akappiyaa.d.do naama, na va.t.tati.

[03]katha.m anaagata.m aarabbha odissaaacikkhanaa hoti? vuttanayeneva parehi anaacaaraadiisu katesu bhikkhunii vohaarike eva.m vadati ``amhaaka.m upassaye ida~ncida~nca karonti, rakkha.m no ^a^V0.0172^ea^ detha aayati.m akara.natthaayaa''ti. ``kena eva.m kata''nti vutte ca ``asukena asukena caa''ti ^a^M0.0183^ea^ aacikkhati. eva.m anaagata.m aarabbha odissaaacikkhanaa hoti, saapi na va.t.tati. tesa~nhi da.n.de kate purimanayeneva sabba.m bhikkhuniyaa giivaa. sesa.m purimasadisameva.

[03]sace pana vohaarikaa ``bhikkhunupassaye evaruupa.m anaacaara.m karontaana.m ima.m naama da.n.da.m karomaa''ti bheri.m caraapetvaa aa.naaya ati.t.thamaane pariyesitvaa da.n.da.m karonti, bhikkhuniyaa neva giivaa na aapatti.

[03]yo caaya.m bhikkhuniina.m vutto, bhikkhuunampi eseva nayo. bhikkhunopi hi odissaaacikkhanaa na va.t.tati. ya.m tathaa aacikkhite da.n.da.m karonti, sabba.m ^a^P4.0910^ea^ giivaa hoti. vuttanayeneva da.n.da.m ga.nhaapentassa paaraajika.m. yo pana ``da.n.da.m karissantii''ti jaanantopi anodissa katheti, te ca pariyesitvaa da.n.da.m karontiyeva, na doso. vihaarasiimaaya rukkhaadiini chindantaana.m vaasipharasuaadiini gahetvaa paasaa.nehi ko.t.tenti, na va.t.tati. sace dhaaraa bhijjati, kaaraapetvaa daatabbaa. upadhaavitvaa tesa.m parikkhaare ga.nhanti, tampi na kaatabba.m, lahuparivatta~nhi citta.m, theyyacetanaaya uppannaaya muulacchejjampi gaccheyya. sesa.m uttaanameva.
[03]kathinasamu.t.thaana.m -- kiriya.m, nosa~n~naavimokkha.m, acittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] sattarasake pa.thamasikkhaapada.m.

[03] 683^b^.^eb^ ^b^anapaloketvaa^eb^ti anaapucchitvaa. ^b^ga.na.m vaa^eb^ti mallaga.nabha.tiputtaga.naadika.m. ^b^puuga^eb^nti dhammaga.na.m. ^b^se.ni^eb^nti gandhikase.nidussikase.niaadika.m. yattha yattha hi raajaano ga.naadiina.m gaamanigame niyyaatenti ``tumheva ettha anusaasathaa''ti, tattha tattha te eva issaraa honti. tasmaa te sandhaaya ida.m vutta.m. ettha ca raajaana.m vaa ga.naadike vaa aapucchitvaapi bhikkhunisa"ngho ^a^V0.0173^ea^ aapucchitabbova. ^b^.thapetvaa kappa^eb^nti titthiyesu vaa ^a^M0.0184^ea^ a~n~nabhikkhuniisu vaa pabbajitapubba.m kappagatika.m .thapetvaati. sesa.m uttaanameva.

[03]coriivu.t.thaapanasamu.t.thaana.m -- kenaci kara.niiyena pakkantaasu bhikkhuniisu agantvaa kha.n.dasiima.m yathaanisinna.t.thaaneyeva attano nissitakaparisaaya saddhi.m vu.t.thaapentiyaa vaacaacittato samu.t.thaati, kha.n.dasiima.m vaa nadi.m vaa gantvaa vu.t.thaapentiyaa kaayavaacaacittato samu.t.thaati, anaapucchaa vu.t.thaapanavasena kiriyaakiriya.m, sa~n~naavimokkha.m, sacittaka.m, pa.n.nattivajja.m, kaayakamma.m, vaciikamma.m, ticitta.m, tivedananti.
[06] dutiyasikkhaapada.m.

[03] 692^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^P4.0911^ea^ -- ^b^parikkhepa.m atikkaamentiyaa^eb^ti ettha eka.m paada.m atikkaamentiyaa thullaccaya.m, dutiyena atikkantamatte sa"nghaadiseso. ^b^aparikkhittassa gaamassa upacaara^eb^nti ettha parikkhepaaraha.t.thaana.m ekena paadena atikkamati thullaccaya.m, dutiyena atikkantamatte sa"nghaadiseso. apicettha sakagaamato nikkhamantiyaa gaamantarapaccayaa anaapatti, nikkhamitvaa pana gaamantara.m gacchantiyaa padavaare padavaare dukka.ta.m, ekena paadena itarassa gaamassa parikkhepe vaa upacaare vaa atikkantamatte thullaccaya.m, dutiyena atikkantamatte sa"nghaadiseso. tato nikkhamitvaa puna sakagaama.m pavisantiyaapi eseva nayo. sace pana kha.n.dapaakaarena vaa vatichiddena vaa bhikkhunivihaarabhuumiyeva sakkaa hoti pavisitu.m, eva.m pavisamaanaaya kappiyabhuumi.m naama pavi.t.thaa hoti, tasmaa va.t.tati. sacepi hatthipi.t.thiaadiihi vaa iddhiyaa vaa pavisati, va.t.tatiyeva. padasaa gamanameva hi idhaadhippeta.m. teneva ``pa.thama.m paada.m atikkaamentiyaa''tiaadimaaha.

[03]dve gaamaa bhikkhunivihaarena sambaddhavatikaa honti, yasmi.m gaame bhikkhunivihaaro, tattha pi.n.daaya caritvaa puna vihaara.m pavisitvaa sace vihaaramajjhena itarassa gaamassa maggo atthi, gantu.m va.t.tati. tato pana gaamato teneva maggena paccaagantabba.m. sace gaamadvaarena nikkhamitvaa aagacchati, purimanayeneva aapattibhedo veditabbo. sakagaamato kenaci ^a^M0.0185^ea^ kara.niiyena bhikkhuniihi saddhi.m nikkhantaaya puna pavisanakaale hatthi vaa muccati, ussaara.naa vaa hoti, itaraa ^a^V0.0174^ea^ bhikkhuniyo sahasaa gaama.m pavisanti, yaava a~n~naa bhikkhunii aagacchati, taava bahigaamadvaare .thaatabba.m. sace na aagacchati, dutiyikaa bhikkhunii pakkantaa naama hoti, pavisitu.m va.t.tati.

[03]pubbe mahaagaamo hoti, majjhe bhikkhunivihaaro. pacchaa ta.m gaama.m cattaaro janaa labhitvaa visu.m visu.m vatiparikkhepa.m katvaa vibhajitvaa bhu~njanti, vihaarato eka.m gaama.m gantu.m va.t.tati. tato apara.m gaama.m dvaarena vaa vatichiddena ^a^P4.0912^ea^ vaa pavisitu.m na va.t.tati. puna vihaarameva paccaagantu.m va.t.tati. kasmaa? vihaarassa catugaamasaadhaara.nattaa.

[03]^b^antaravaasako temiyatii^eb^ti yattha yathaa tima.n.dalapa.ticchaadana.m hoti; eva.m nivatthaaya bhikkhuniyaa vassakaale titthena vaa atitthena vaa otaritvaa yattha katthaci uttarantiyaa ekadva"ngulamattampi antaravaasako temiyati. sesa.m nadiilakkha.na.m nadiinimittakathaaya aavi bhavissati. evaruupa.m nadi.m titthena vaa atitthena vaa otaritvaa uttara.nakaale pa.thama.m paada.m uddharitvaa tiire .thapentiyaa thullaccaya.m, dutiyapaaduddhaare sa"nghaadiseso. setunaa gacchati, anaapatti. padasaa otaritvaa uttara.nakaale setu.m aarohitvaa uttarantiyaapi anaapatti. setunaa pana gantvaa uttara.nakaale padasaa gacchantiyaa aapattiyeva. yaananaavaaaakaasagamanaadiisupi eseva nayo. orimatiirato pana paratiirameva akkamantiyaa anaapatti. rajanakammattha.m gantvaa daarusa"nka.d.dhanaadikiccena dve tisso ubhayatiiresu vicaranti, va.t.tati. sace panettha kaaci kalaha.m katvaa itara.m tiira.m gacchati, aapatti. dve ekato uttaranti, ekaa majjhe nadiyaa kalaha.m katvaa nivattitvaa orimatiirameva aagacchati, aapatti. itarissaa pana aya.m pakkanta.t.thaane .thitaa hoti, tasmaa paratiira.m gacchantiyaapi anaapatti. nhaayitu.m vaa paatu.m vaa oti.n.naa tameva tiira.m paccuttarati, anaapatti.

[03]^b^saha aru.nuggamanaa^eb^ti ettha sace sajjhaaya.m vaa padhaana.m vaa a~n~na.m vaa ki~nci kamma.m kurumaanaa purearu.neyeva dutiyikaaya santika.m gamissaamiiti aabhoga.m karoti, ajaanantiyaa eva cassaa aru.no uggacchati, anaapatti. atha pana ``yaava aru.nuggamanaa idheva bhavissaamii''ti vaa anaabhogena vaa vihaarassa ekadese acchati, dutiyikaaya hatthapaasa.m na ^a^M0.0186^ea^ otarati, aru.nuggamane sa"nghaadiseso. hatthapaasoyeva hi idha pamaa.na.m, hatthapaasaatikkame ekagabbhopi na rakkhati.

[03]^b^agaamake^eb^ ^a^V0.0175^ea^ ^b^ara~n~ne^eb^ti ettha ``nikkhamitvaa bahi indakhiilaa sabbameta.m ara~n~na''nti eva.m vuttalakkha.nameva ara~n~na.m. ta.m paneta.m kevala.m gaamaabhaavena ``agaamaka''nti vutta.m, na vi~njhaa.tavisadisataaya. taadise ^a^P4.0913^ea^ ara~n~ne okkante dassanuupacaare vijahite sacepi savanuupacaaro atthi, aapatti. teneva vutta.m a.t.thakathaaya.m ``sace bhikkhuniisu mahaabodhia"nga.na.m pavisantiisu ekaa bahi ti.t.thati, tassaapi aapatti. lohapaasaada.m pavisantiisupi parive.na.m pavisantiisupi eseva nayo. mahaacetiya.m vandamaanaasu ekaa uttaradvaarena nikkhamitvaa gacchati, tassaapi aapatti. thuupaaraama.m pavisantiisu ekaa bahi ti.t.thati, tassaapi aapattii''ti. ettha ca dassanuupacaaro naama yattha .thita.m dutiyikaa passati. sace pana saa.nipaakaarantarikaapi hoti, dassanuupacaara.m vijahati naama. savanuupacaaro naama yattha .thitaa maggamuu.lhasaddena viya dhammasavanaarocanasaddena viya ca ``ayye''ti saddaayantiyaa sadda.m su.naati. ajjhokaase duurepi dassanuupacaaro naama hoti. so evaruupe savanuupacaare vijahite na rakkhati, vijahitamatteva aapatti sa"nghaadisesassa.

[03]ekaa magga.m gacchantii ohiiyati. saussaahaa ce hutvaa idaani paapu.nissaamiiti anubandhati, anaapatti. sace purimaayo a~n~nena maggena gacchanti, pakkantaa naama honti, anaapattiyeva. dvinna.m gacchantiina.m ekaa anubandhitu.m asakkontii ``gacchatu aya''nti ohiiyati, itaraapi ``ohiiyatu aya''nti, gacchati, dvinnampi aapatti. sace pana gacchantiisu purimaapi a~n~na.m magga.m ga.nhaati, pacchimaapi a~n~na.m, ekaa ekissaa pakkanta.t.thaane ti.t.thati, dvinnampi anaapatti.
